snippet: President Obama has chosen David S. Cohen, who has directed the effort to cut off funding of the Islamic State and impose economic sanctions on Syria, Russia and Iran, to become the C.I.A.’s deputy director.
abstract: President Obama selects Treasury Dept official David S Cohen to become Central Intelligence Agency's deputy director.
lead_paragraph: President Obama has chosen David S. Cohen, who has directed the effort to cut off funding of the Islamic State and impose economic sanctions on Syria, Russia and Iran, to become the C.I.A.’s deputy director.

headline.main: Reaching Outside C.I.A., Obama Picks Treasury Official to Become Agency’s No. 2
headline.print_headline: Reaching Outside C.I.A., Obama Calls on Treasury Official to Become Agency’s No. 2
